title: Runaway Kids
lyrics:
We are, we are one, we are one
And we know just what we want
We know just what we want
We are, we are one under the sun
And we know just what we want
We know just what we want



Maybe there's something I don't understand

It's been a long day in this hideaway

And since I've been kicking around

Just wondering if something might change

And you can call it our condition, it's all

Just primal ways in a modern age

And when all the crimes unfold

It'll be a long day



We are, we are one, we are one

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want

We are, we are one under the sun

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want



Yeah, and what if we had wings to fly

And what if we could run at the speed of light

And what if there were ways to save today's crace

And you woke up with the strength to fight

Another season floats by

The system's gonna fall

By the way, [?]



And you can call it our condition, it's all

Just primal ways in a modern age

And when all the crimes unfold

It'll be a long day



We are, we are one, we are one

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want

We are, we are one under the sun

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want (Eh)



Wasted on the young youth, the old money

I'm cold, shoot, bald, funny

Can I say, wait, no please don't preach

Writing on my darlings' tweets and feeds

But you're playing the part in charades though

Playing the, playing the part in charades though

But this is no longer a game though

And I am no, I am no longer afraid, no



It's been a long day

But I still believe in

It's been a long day

But I still believe in



We are, we are one, we are one

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want

We are, we are one under the sun

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want



We are, we are one, we are one

And we know just what we want

We know just what we want

We are, we are one under the sun

We know just what we want
